view.animations

Class ExplosionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.animations.unit.AbstractAnimationView
      • view.animations.unit.AbstractSingleAnimationView
        • view.animations.ExplosionView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimationView, SingleAnimationView

    public class ExplosionView
extends AbstractSingleAnimationView
    This class handles the representation of a TileImpl involved in a bomb's explosion.

      • ExplosionView

        public ExplosionView(Tile tile,
                     int fps,
                     long duration)
        Constructs a new view for the exploded tile.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile where the explosion occurred
        fps - the number of frame-per-second
        duration - the duration (in milliseconds) of the animation
